org.youscope.common.task

Interface MeasurementTask

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EditableJobContainer, JobContainer, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface MeasurementTask
extends EditableJobContainer
    Interface represents a task. A task is a process which--regularly or not, once or often--submits its jobs to the job execution queue, where they get executed in a FIFO manner. Each measurement must have one or more tasks.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTaskListener(TaskListener listener)
      Adds a listener which gets informed over the progress of the task.
      boolean isRunning()
      Returns if task is currently executed.
      void removeTaskListener(TaskListener listener)
      Removes a previously added listener.
